movies.title: Swerve
movies.plot: Colin happens upon a road accident where he finds a dead man, a beautiful woman, and a suitcase full of money. After trying to do the right thing he soon finds himself caught up in a dangerous scheme.
movies.simplePlot: Colin happens upon a road accident where he finds a dead man, a beautiful woman, and a suitcase full of money. After trying to do the right thing he soon finds himself caught up in a dangerous scheme.

biography.bio: Jason Clarke was born on July 17, 1969 in Winton, Queensland, Australia. He is an actor and producer, known for Zero Dark Thirty (2012), Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (2014) and Everest (2015).
biography.name: Jason Clarke

biography.bio: Emma Booth was born in 1982 in Perth, Western Australia, Australia. She is an actress, known for Love Hunters (2016), Glitch (2015) and Gods of Egypt (2016).
biography.name: Emma Booth

biography.bio: David Lyons was born on April 16, 1976 in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia. He is an actor and director, known for Safe Haven (2013), Revolution (2012) and Sea Patrol (2007).
biography.name: David Lyons

biography.bio: Travis McMahon is an actor, known for Kokoda: 39th Battalion (2006), Miss Fisher enquête (2012) and Cactus (2008).
biography.name: Travis McMahon

biography.bio: Vince Colosimo has worked a lot in theatre, television and film since the early 1980s. He is widely known for his role in the hugely successful theatre production of The Wogboys, which toured nationally in the mid 1990s and was later adapted to a feature film in 2000. Colosimo's theatre work has also included productions of A Streetcar Named Desire, The Club, Twelfth Night and Othello for the Melbourne Theatre Company, and Romeo And Juliet. His television work has included a sustaining role in All The Way and, A Country Practice and guest roles in Good Guys Bad Guys, Halifax, Stingers, Something In The Air and most recently, probably the biggest show he's ever been in, The Secret Life of Us as Rex Mariano. Colosimo's previous film credits include Street Hero and Moving Out for which he was nominated for the Australian Film Institute Award for Best Actor in 1984, and which won him the Sydney Film Critics Circle Award for best New Talent. He has most recently been seen in the feature film that is internationally acclaimed Chopper which won the Australian Film Institute's Best Director Award in 2000.
biography.name: Vince Colosimo

biography.bio: Robert Mammone was born in 1971 in Adelaide, South Australia, Australia. He is an actor and producer, known for Summer Bay (1988), Matrix Revolutions (2003) and The Matrix Reloaded (2003).
biography.name: Robert Mammone

biography.bio: Chris Haywood was born on July 24, 1948 in Billericay, Essex, England as Christopher Charles Haywood. He is an actor and production manager, known for Shine (1996), Jindabyne, Australie (2006) and Mr Quigley l'Australien (1990).
biography.name: Chris Haywood

biography.bio: Roy Billing was born in 1947 in Ruawai, Northland, New Zealand as Roy Harwood Billing. He is an actor, known for The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader (2010), Le chemin de la liberté (2002) and Aquamarine (2006).
biography.name: Roy Billing

biography.bio: Greg Stone is an actor, known for The Bank (2001), Underbelly Files: Tell Them Lucifer Was Here (2011) and Van Diemen's Land (2009).
biography.name: Greg Stone

biography.bio: Andy Anderson was born on July 18, 1947 in Naenae, Wellington, New Zealand. He is an actor, known for La maison de cire (2005), The Bob Morrison Show (1994) and Fire (1995).
biography.name: Andy Anderson

biography.bio: Scott Harrison is an actor, known for White Lines (2008), Swerve (2011) and The Heckler (2014).
biography.name: Scott Harrison

biography.bio: Brendan Guerin is known for his work on The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (2013), The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (2014) and Knowing (2009).
biography.name: Brendan Guerin

biography.bio: Brendan Rock is an actor and producer, known for The Snowtown Murders (2011), Danger 5 (2011) and Swerve (2011).
biography.name: Brendan Rock

biography.bio: Edmund Pegge is an actor, known for Swerve (2011), Heaven's Burning (1997) and Stage Fright (1980).
biography.name: Edmund Pegge

biography.bio: Luke Jericho is an actor, known for Swerve (2011).
biography.name: Luke Jericho
